abstract: Bank of America, Citigroup and Wells Fargo are the subjects of state and federal investigations into abusive mortgage practices and how the banks conducted home foreclosures.
snippet: Bank of America, Citigroup and Wells Fargo are the subjects of state and federal investigations into abusive mortgage practices and how the banks conducted home foreclosures.
lead_paragraph: Several big banks warned investors on Friday that they could face sizable financial penalties as a result of state and federal investigations into abusive mortgage practices.

headline.main: 3 Banks Warn of Big Penalties in Mortgage Inquiries

byline.original: By Nelson D. Schwartz and Eric Dash
